description:
Scarlet is to accompany Saint Diana`s Holy Land Pilgrimage, but the servants of Palmianism stand in her way.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Buta-san o Sora ni Tobashite Sashiagete mo Yoroshii Deshouka
May I Send This Pig Flying into the Sky?
¿Puedo lanzar por los aires a esos cerdos?
豚さんを空に飛ばして差し上げてもよろしいでしょうか
